list.a8: Regional Operational Programme of the Lesser Poland Voivodeship for 2014–2020
list.a9: 6.3. DEVELOPMENT OF INTERNAL POTENTIALS OF THE REGION
list.t1: Increase competitiveness by expanding the Muszyna health resort's offer in the field of sports and recreation services.
list.t2: The project concerns construction and equipment of a sports-recreational park in Złockie, plot no. 1674, Muszyna resort area. It includes 4 tasks: 1Construction, 2Equipment, 3Indirect costs, 4Non-eligible costs. Task 1: a 3-storey sports facility with internal installations, technical infrastructure, and landscaping. Architecture matches surroundings, simple form, good insulation. Ground floor: lobby, restaurant, kitchen, courts, food and sports storage, social rooms, lockers, WC, table tennis, reception, bike rental. 1st floor: playrooms, TV room, technical, coaching and first aid rooms, office, squash, lockers, WC. 2nd floor: gym, guard room, service rooms, lockers, WC. Plot: 8047 m²; building: 1204.22 m²; usable area: 2316.83 m²; volume: 11,430 m³; height: 13.33 m. Energy-efficient design, 25–50% less energy than traditional buildings. Accessible for disabled people. Task 2: purchase of high-standard, safe equipment. Task 3: project management. Task 4: additional non-eligible equipment. Solutions meet identified needs, including year-round tourism and sports offer.

hero.welcome: Welcome to Muszynova! Food & Fun to discover on

about.header: Sport and Fun for young and old at a nOvy level

alt.1: Sports Hall

about.text: Is there a facility where everyone can be themselves and spend time the way they like? This was our idea when we designed Muszynova. To make everyone feel comfortable. With the youngest, teenagers and adults, families and singles, visitors and residents and organized groups in mind, our Recreation and Sports Park was created. We open the door to entertainment and activity at a new level of quality.

restaurant.header2: We’re setting a new standard and rediscovering the flavors of the Beskids – the novo way
restaurant.text: Looking for a unique place to enjoy a culinary experience in Muszyna or near Nowy Sącz? Muszynova Restaurant invites you to discover the flavors of the Beskids with a modern twist. It's the perfect spot for a family lunch, romantic dinner, special celebration, or business meeting. We offer a unique atmosphere, healthy and light dishes, and professional service.

alt.1: Modern-style vegetable salad served for dinner
alt.3: Ice cream in a wafer cone
alt.6: Coffee with whipped cream in a cup

item1.text: We promote the flavors of Beskid cuisine. We rediscover them anew, adding a modern twist.

item2.text: We think of the little ones, ensuring they enjoy their time with us. Happy kids are more eager to eat. Favorite fries? Why not sweet potato fries? We delight taste buds and teach healthy habits. To your health!

item3.text: Delicious food, healthier choices, and a cozy atmosphere. Pleasure rediscovered anew, not just in dining but also in enjoying a beautiful, loft-style interior.

item4.text: Pizza can be a healthier option with whole-grain flour. Don’t just eat—savor and nourish yourself with us.

item5.text: Great coffee, a touch of alcohol, a light salad, or a delightful piece of homemade dessert? The perfect spot to relax with a book or spend a pleasant evening with a loved one.

item6.text: A separate room for hosting celebrations with attractions for the youngest guests. Adults can chat at the table while kids… we promise food & fun for everyone.

aboutus.text: Muszynova – the name is a creative blend of the location 'Muszyna' and the word 'modern' in an international spelling, as we are open to everyone. It’s a promise, an invitation to rediscover the well-known resort in a 'new' way. In a fresh edition, with a new standard, for both young and old, we welcome local residents and tourists, individually or in groups. Active, delicious, uncompromising – that’s our new approach. A modern park and restaurant invite you to spend time in Muszyna differently, the way you like it. Rediscover the world of food and fun, surrounded by the beautiful nature of the Beskid Sądecki region.

alt.1: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park from the outside against a beautiful natural backdrop

behind.p1: Is it possible to combine active leisure with relaxation in nature and the comfort of a modern space? Yes! That’s exactly why Muszynova was created – a unique place on the map of the Sądecki Beskid, designed for those looking for more than just accommodation or another attraction.
behind.p2: Our inspiration was Muszyna – a spa town with a unique atmosphere, surrounded by mountain trails, forests, and mineral springs. A place with history, but also great potential, deserving a fresh, modern perspective. This is how Muszynova was born – a fusion of tradition and innovation, local character and openness to the world.
behind.p3: From the beginning, we knew we wanted to create more than a sports and leisure complex. We wanted to build a space of experiences – for families, tourists, locals, and lovers of an active lifestyle. That’s why Muszynova offers not only modern sports zones and a restaurant, but also the philosophy of “na novo” – built on quality, nature, and spending time together.
behind.p4: Today, Muszynova is more than a place – it’s an idea. A new level of rest and recreation that combines the best: local flavors, Beskid hospitality, physical activity, and the beauty of nature. We invite you to discover Muszyna “na novo” – through the eyes of those who put their heart into this place.

cards.text: Muszyna is a well-known and beloved spa town that has been developing dynamically in recent years, attracting tourists from all over the world. This charming resort, nestled in the Beskid Sądecki region, captivates with its nature and numerous attractions, including sensory gardens, historic landmarks, mountain and cycling trails, as well as mineral water springs.

card1.text: In peace, with a view of green forests, right by the trail, with the distant sound of the Poprad River. That’s how you’ll spend your time with us – a new quality of interiors, paired with the beautiful surroundings of the Beskid region.

card2.text: A concise menu in a modern style with a Beskid touch. Light, nourishing, for kids and adults alike. Delicious coffee, drinks, and for kids, familiar favorites like pizza and desserts in a healthier version. With us, you can also host celebrations with attractions.

card3.text: Active leisure time in a new way, with fun. We encourage movement from an early age and are well-prepared for it. Four modernly equipped activity zones with facilities await professional athletes, juniors, families, and individual users.

card4.text: We combine comfort, nature, and activity in one place. We focus on quality, intimacy, and a local atmosphere that can be felt in every detail – from interior design to the taste of our dishes. We create a space where everyone – regardless of age – will find something for themselves: peace, inspiration, or a dose of healthy movement. We are a place that lives to the rhythm of Muszyna but looks at the world with a modern perspective – this is our NOva quality.

cta.header: Welcome to the Muszynova Recreation and Sports Park!
cta.text: After exploring, we invite you to our Muszynova Recreation and Sports Park, which offers plenty of attractions for everyone! You'll find a sports hall with surfaces for playing football, volleyball, or basketball, a climbing wall, squash courts, a children's playroom with mazes and slides, a bike rental, a gym, and a fitness room. It's the perfect place to spend active time with family, friends, or on your own. Our restaurant serves light dishes with regional accents, and we've prepared special attractions for children. Visit us and discover entertainment at a new level!

blog.noArticlesFound: No articles matching the search were found.
blog.text: Discover Muszyna in a new way with Muszynova! Our blog is the place where we share inspiration, local curiosities, ideas for active leisure, and the latest events from the Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park. Get to know Muszyna from the inside – through the eyes of nature, sports, and Beskid hospitality enthusiasts.

1.title: What to see in Muszyna? Top 10 attractions
1.text: Muszyna, a picturesque spa town in the Beskid Sądecki, nestled in the Poprad Valley, is the perfect place to relax for lovers of nature, history, and active leisure. Known for its healing mineral waters, rich history, and beautiful landscapes, it attracts tourists all year round. We’ve prepared a list of the 10 best attractions that will make you fall in love with this place. And at the end, we invite you to visit our Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park, where plenty of entertainment awaits!

meta.title: Top 10 best attractions in Muszyna
meta.description: Discover the 10 most interesting attractions in Muszyna – from themed gardens to historic castles. The perfect list for any season.

list.1: 1. Sensory Gardens (Gardens of the Senses) – Muszyna’s biggest attraction, located on the slopes of Sucha Góra. Divided into zones of health, scents, sounds, taste, and touch, they offer therapeutic experiences for all senses. Strolling among fragrant herbs, murmuring streams, and colorful plants is the perfect way to relax. At the top, there’s a viewing tower with a panoramic view of the Beskid Sądecki and the Tatra Mountains on clear days.
list.2: 2. Biblical Gardens – Located next to the Church of St. Joseph the Betrothed, the Biblical Gardens are a place of reflection and peace. Designed for meditation, they present scenes from the Bible in creative ways (e.g., a pond reminiscent of Moses or a fig tree symbolizing paradise). Entry is free, and nearby you’ll find the “Maryja” mineral spring.
list.3: 3. Castle Ruins (Baszta Hill) – The ruins of a medieval castle on Baszta Hill are one of Muszyna’s oldest landmarks. Built in the 14th century, it served as a fortress of the Muszyna State. Though only fragments of walls remain, the site offers a beautiful view of the Poprad Valley. In May, prayer services are held here at the statue of the Virgin Mary.
list.4: 4. Regional Museum of the Muszyna State – Housed in a reconstructed 17th-century inn, the museum introduces the history of Muszyna, Lemko culture, and the Muszyna State. You’ll find exhibits related to wine trade, crafts, and local traditions. A great place to learn about the region’s rich past.
list.5: 5. Church of St. Joseph the Betrothed – This Baroque church from the turn of the 17th and 18th centuries is a gem of Muszyna’s architecture. Inside, there is a Gothic statue of the Virgin Mary with Child and a Renaissance tabernacle. Next to the church, don’t miss the historic wall and the 1803 bell tower.
list.6: 6. Zapopradzie Spa Park – Perfect for families and those seeking relaxation. It features outdoor pools, an ice rink (in winter), a skatepark, and walking paths. This recreational hub is lively all year round.
list.7: 7. Mineral Water Pump Rooms – Muszyna is famous for its mineral waters like “Muszynianka”. Pump rooms such as “Milusia” or “Cechini” let you taste healing waters. An essential part of any spa visit, combining health with pleasure.
list.8: 8. Hiking and Cycling Trails – Muszyna is a paradise for active leisure lovers. Hiking trails (e.g., to Jaworzyna Krynicka) and cycling routes in the Beskid Sądecki offer breathtaking views. Popular cycling routes can be found around Złockie.
list.9: 9. Poprad River Rafting – The Poprad River is perfect for mountain kayaking or rafting. Pontoon trips of varying difficulty – from family-friendly to extreme – provide unforgettable thrills. Great for adrenaline seekers.
list.10: 10. Viewing Tower on Malnik Hill – Opened in 2023, this 40-metre tower on Malnik Hill is Muszyna’s newest attraction. It offers spectacular views of the Beskid Sądecki and surrounding mountain ranges. Perfect for a short trip and landscape admiration.

alt.1: People on a mountain trail in Muszyna
alt.4: Map of tourist trails in Muszyna and Krynica

cta.text: Want to truly feel the atmosphere of Muszyna? After exploring the attractions, head to the Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park – bikes, squash, gym, children’s attractions, and regional cuisine await. All in one place!

2.title: The best hiking trails in Muszyna – discover the Beskid Sądecki
2.text: Muszyna, located in the heart of the Beskid Sądecki, is an ideal base for mountain hiking enthusiasts. Surrounded by picturesque Poprad valleys, forests, and peaks, it offers trails of varying difficulty – from easy family walks to challenging loops for experienced hikers. Below are the best trails around Muszyna that will let you discover the beauty of the region. At the end, we invite you to the Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park for active relaxation and regional flavors after your hike!
2.header2: Why is Muszyna a paradise for hikers?
2.header3: The best hiking trails in Muszyna

meta.title: Best Hiking Trails in Muszyna
meta.description: Check out the best hiking trails in Muszyna – scenic, family-friendly, and challenging routes. For beginners and advanced hikers alike.

list.1: 1. Malnik Hill Trail – a viewpoint for everyone Length: approx. 4.5 km (loop) Time: approx. 1.5 h Difficulty: Easy Description: Malnik Hill (726 m a.s.l.) is one of the best viewpoints in Muszyna, perfect for beginners and families. The yellow trail starts in the center of Muszyna, passes the old Jewish cemetery, and climbs to the summit, where a 40-metre viewing tower opened in 2023. The tower offers a panorama of the Beskid Sądecki, and on clear days even the Tatra Mountains. The route is short, well-marked, and has gentle ascents.
list.2: 2. Trail to Jaworzyna Krynicka – a classic of the Beskid Sądecki Length: approx. 9 km (from Muszyna via Złockie to the summit) Time: approx. 3–4 h one way Difficulty: Medium/Demanding Description: The green trail from Muszyna through Złockie to Jaworzyna Krynicka (1114 m a.s.l.) is a must for mountain lovers. Along the way, you pass the “Cechini” mineral water pump room and the St. Demetrius church in Złockie (part of the Wooden Architecture Route). The trail goes through forests and meadows, and at the top awaits a PTTK shelter and views of the Tatras, Pieniny, and Beskid Niski. Less experienced hikers can shorten the route by using the gondola from Krynica-Zdrój.
list.3: 3. “Sadzona Jaja” Loop Trail – a walk with history Length: approx. 8 km (loop) Time: approx. 2.5–3 h Difficulty: Easy Description: This scenic route from Muszyna to Złockie, known as the “Sadzona Jaja Trail”, passes through Koziejówka (636 m a.s.l.) and the Złockie Tent Base. It starts at 21 Stycznia Street, passes the St. Anna spring, and climbs the ridge. Along the way, you’ll see the Lipowy Las Obrożyska nature reserve and the St. Demetrius church in Złockie. Perfect for families, combining nature with Lemko history.
list.4: 4. Trail to Bacówka nad Wierchomlą – views and tranquility Length: approx. 2.5 km (from Wierchomla Mała, one way) Time: approx. 1 h one way Difficulty: Easy Description: The black trail from Wierchomla Mała (about 10 km from Muszyna) to Bacówka nad Wierchomlą is short but extremely picturesque, especially recommended for families with children. From the meadow near the shelter, there are views of the Tatras, Pieniny, and Radziejowa Range. The shelter is famous for its cozy atmosphere and delicious regional dishes. You can drive to the ski lift to shorten the route.
list.5: 5. Nature trail to Czarna Młaka – a hidden gem Length: approx. 4 km (loop from Powroźnik) Time: approx. 1.5–2 h Difficulty: Easy Description: Czarna Młaka, located on the slopes of Czarne Garby, is a unique landslide lake protected as a natural monument. The yellow trail from Powroźnik (about 5 km from Muszyna) runs through the forest, making it ideal on hot days. On site, there are viewing platforms and a gazebo. A peaceful, rarely crowded route, perfect for those seeking silence and contact with nature.

alt.1: Castle in Muszyna with tower and viewpoint

cta.text: Planning a mountain adventure? Start at Muszynova – rent a bike, use our maps, plan your route, and relax in our park when you return. Active leisure starts comfortably and stress-free with us.

3.title: How to spend a weekend in Muszyna? Plan for the perfect getaway
3.text: Muszyna, a charming spa town in the Beskid Sądecki, is a fantastic destination for a weekend trip. Located in the Poprad Valley, it offers a blend of relaxation, outdoor activities, rich history, and regional flavors. We’ve put together the perfect weekend plan in Muszyna to help you discover the city’s biggest attractions and surroundings. And for dessert, we invite you to our Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park, where plenty of fun awaits! Here’s a two-day itinerary full of impressions.
3.header3: The best hiking trails in Muszyna

meta.title: How to spend a weekend in Muszyna
meta.description: Plan the perfect weekend in Muszyna – attractions, activities, and local flavors that will make you fall in love with the place.

list.1: Day 1: Relaxation and history – Start your weekend with a walk through the Sensory Gardens on the slopes of Sucha Góra, where you’ll relax among fragrant herbs and streams while admiring the Beskid Sądecki from the viewing tower. Then visit the medieval castle ruins on Baszta Hill, offering a view of the Poprad Valley. Have lunch at Karczma nad Popradem, trying dumplings with bryndza or trout. Afterward, head to the Biblical Gardens at St. Joseph’s Church to quietly admire Bible-inspired arrangements and taste water from the “Maryja” spring. Stop by the “Milusia” pump room to sample healing “Muszynianka”. End the day with a walk in Zapopradzie Spa Park, full of paths and ponds, and have dinner at Restauracja Muszynova with regional specialties.
list.2: Day 2: Nature and activity – Begin the second day with a hike up Malnik Hill, where an easy trail leads to the 2023 viewing tower with a panorama of the Beskid Sądecki. Then experience adventure on a family-friendly Poprad pontoon rafting trip organized by Poprad Rafting. After rafting, have lunch at Gospoda u Krakowiaka in Złockie, tasting Lemko żurek or homemade dishes. Next, visit the Regional Museum in the 17th-century inn to learn about Muszyna’s history and Lemko culture. Spend some time in the town center shopping for souvenirs or having coffee at Cafe Muszyna. Finish the weekend at the Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park – play volleyball, try the climbing wall, rent a bike, or work out at the gym. Kids will love the playground with mazes and slides. Dinner at the park’s restaurant with regional dishes.

alt.1: I Love Muszyna sign
alt.4: View of the castle in Muszyna

cta.header: A weekend full of attractions? Only with Muszynova
cta.text: Plan an unforgettable weekend with Muszynova’s help! We offer bikes, squash, family attractions, and delicious cuisine all in one place. We make active leisure easy – right in Muszyna.

4.title: Active leisure in the Beskid Sądecki
4.text: The area around Muszyna and Krynica-Zdrój is where nature meets culture, and active leisure blends with relaxation. Rafting down the Poprad, a bike ride on the Velo Krynica trail, or a stroll along Krynica’s promenade are just some of the possibilities this region offers. Visit Muszyna, take advantage of the Muszynova bike rental, and explore the Beskid Sądecki on your own!
4.header3: The surroundings of Muszyna and Krynica are a paradise for activity lovers

meta.title: Active leisure in Muszyna and Krynica-Zdrój – Beskid Sądecki
meta.description: Discover the charms of the Beskid Sądecki! Poprad rafting, Velo Krynica cycling routes, mountain hikes, and relaxation in Muszyna. The perfect place for a weekend full of activity and nature.

list.1: Hiking and cycling trails – Relaxation and history – The Beskid Sądecki offers countless trails of varying difficulty. From Muszyna, it’s worth taking the green trail to Jaworzyna Krynicka (1114 m a.s.l.), which offers breathtaking panoramas of the Beskids and even the Tatras on clear days. The route passes through the “Las Lipowy Obrożyska” reserve and the castle ruins in Muszyna, making it both a nature and historical adventure. For cyclists, the Velo Krynica trail (about 12 km) from Krynica through Powroźnik to Muszyna is ideal. The route is comfortable, separated from car traffic, and safe for families with children. Bike rentals, including electric ones, are available in Krynica to make climbing easier.
list.2: Poprad River rafting – Nature and activity – The Poprad River flowing through Muszyna is perfect for kayaking or pontoon rafting. A trip from Muszyna to Żegiestów (about 10 km) takes around 2 hours and is gentle, making it ideal for beginners and families. The picturesque landscapes of the Poprad Valley, wooded hills, and calm river current create an unforgettable adventure. Local rafting organizers provide equipment and return transport for comfort and safety. After rafting, we encourage you to continue your active day in Muszyna! Rent bikes at Muszynova and explore the charming cycling routes in the area. The popular route from Muszyna to Krynica runs along the Poprad and lets you enjoy the beauty of the Beskid landscapes. Muszynova rental offers both traditional and electric bikes – perfect for those seeking comfort on slightly hilly terrain. Along the way, you can stop in Muszyna to relax in the Sensory Gardens or taste local specialties in one of the regional inns.

alt.1: Konieczna Meadow

cta.header: Plan an active weekend in the Beskid Sądecki
cta.text: Want to combine relaxation with outdoor activity? The Beskid Sądecki is the perfect place for a weekend getaway. Use Muszynova rental, explore scenic hiking and cycling trails, and experience an unforgettable Poprad rafting trip. Don’t wait – book your active leisure today!

5.title: Squash – a sport with class. Learn its history and why you should try it
5.text: Did you know that squash is one of the fastest and most intense racket sports in the world? A game now associated with a modern lifestyle has its roots in the 19th century!
5.header2: Why has squash conquered the world?

meta.title: The history of squash – where did this dynamic sport come from?
meta.description: Discover the fascinating history of squash – from British schools to world courts. Learn how this elite sport gained popularity and why you should try it!

list.1: Origins in England – squash was born around 1830 in elite British schools (e.g., Harrow School) when students noticed the ball “squashed” (flattened) against the wall – hence the name.
list.2: Development of the discipline – over time, squash gained popularity in sports clubs worldwide, especially in English-speaking countries.
list.3: International recognition – in the 20th century, the first federations (e.g., World Squash Federation) were established, and squash became a professional sport.
list.4: Little space, lots of action – the game requires only a small court, but the intensity and pace are extremely high.
list.5: Sport for busy people – perfect for a quick, effective workout after work – 30 minutes is enough to get a proper workout!
list.6: Accessibility – simple rules, easy to learn at an amateur level, yet with huge tactical depth.
list.7: Squash by numbers (for trivia fans): Over 20 million players worldwide. In a professional match, a player can run up to 5 km in 45 minutes. A squash ball can reach speeds of up to 270 km/h!
list.8: Why play squash at Muszynova? Modern courts with excellent lighting and ventilation. Option for recreational play or lessons with an instructor. Rackets and balls available on site – just come, play, and fall in love!

alt.1: Professional squash court with certified dimensions
alt.2: Squash court with racket and ball in the background
alt.3: Racket and ball on the squash court
alt.4: Squash court with racket and ball

cta.text: Modern courts, great conditions, and equipment rental on site – whether you play recreationally or want to try something new, Muszynova is the perfect place for a sports reset!

6.title: By bike through Muszyna
6.text: Is there anything better than combining active leisure with mountain landscapes, a spa atmosphere, and a touch of adventure? If you dream of a day full of movement, fresh air, and beautiful views, a cycling trip around Muszyna is a bullseye. And the best part? It all starts here – at the Muszynova bike rental, where you’ll set off stress-free with perfectly fitted equipment.

meta.title: By bike through Muszyna – routes, views, and Muszynova rental
meta.description: Discover the most beautiful cycling routes around Muszyna and use Muszynova rental – perfect equipment, route planning help, and stress-free active leisure.

list.1: 1. Muszyna Tourist Loop Length: approx. 30 km Difficulty: medium Time: approx. 4 hours The route runs through the valleys of Muszynka and Szczawny Potok, passing numerous viewpoints and charming villages. Perfect for a half-day trip for those with basic fitness.
list.2: 2. Carpathian Cycling Route (Leluchów–Wierchomla section) Length: approx. 25 km Difficulty: easy Time: 2–3 hours A scenic route along the Poprad Valley – great for families and beginners. Rest stops and several mineral springs await along the way.
list.3: 3. Velo Krynica – from Krynica-Zdrój to Muszyna Length: approx. 11 km Difficulty: very easy This comfortable asphalt path is ideal for beginner cyclists. You can start in Krynica and finish in Muszyna, returning by train or making a loop via Powroźnik.
list.4: Muszynova Bike Rental – ride without your own gear! No bike of your own? Don’t want to bring it on vacation? Muszynova offers a fully equipped rental right next to the Recreational and Sports Park. A convenient solution for everyone – tourists, spa guests, families with children, or MTB enthusiasts. We offer: trekking bikes, mountain bikes, child seats, helmets, and accessories, route maps and help with planning, attractive prices (hourly or full-day rental), regularly serviced bikes fitted to your height.
list.5: Cycling discoveries – what will you see along the way? Sensory Gardens and Biblical Gardens, St. James Church in Powroźnik (UNESCO), castle ruins in Muszyna and viewing platforms, picturesque mineral springs, footbridges over the Poprad, meadows, forests, and rivers. A great way to combine healthy exercise with exploring the region – at your own pace, close to nature.

alt.1: Many bikes in front of Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park in Muszyna

cta.header: Your cycling adventure starts at Muszynova
cta.text: Don’t have a bike? We’ve got you covered! Muszynova rental offers modern bikes and everything you need to hit the trail – comfortably, safely, and with fun. Discover the Beskid Sądecki from the saddle!

7.title: Immerse yourself in health – Muszyna’s mineral waters
7.text: Muszyna is not only picturesque landscapes and mountain trails – it’s also a source of health straight from nature. The mineral waters from local springs are known for their exceptional health properties; regular consumption boosts immunity, improves digestion, and benefits the nervous system. Strolling through the Spa Park with a cup of fresh water is a true pleasure that also strengthens the body.
7.header2: Why is Muszyna water a natural remedy?
7.header3: TOP 3 mineral water springs in Muszyna
7.button: Discover the power of Muszyna water

meta.title: Muszyna mineral waters – a natural source of health | Muszynova
meta.description: Discover the health benefits of Muszyna’s mineral waters. Find out which springs to visit and how they support immunity, digestion, and well-being. Welcome to Muszynova!

list.1: 1. Milusia Spring Location: Spa Park, next to the Antoni Pump Room Water: medium-mineralized, high in magnesium and calcium. Ideal for stressed and tired people. Mild, slightly salty taste.
list.2: 2. Grunwald Spring Location: Ogrodowa Street, lower part of Zapopradzie Park Water: low-mineralized, aids metabolism and has diuretic effects. Often chosen by those on cleansing diets.
list.3: 3. Józef Spring Location: near the Sensory Gardens Water: highly mineralized, recommended for mineral deficiencies, anemia, and heart issues. Distinct, slightly iron-like taste.
list.4: Water straight from nature – health for free While walking around Muszyna, you’ll come across mineral water intakes at every turn. Pump rooms and springs are free to use, and each water has a different composition and taste. You can choose the one that best suits your needs – just bring a bottle and the desire to try.
list.5: Additional benefits: natural treatment without prescription, helps with hypertension and diabetes, positive effect on intestines, stomach, and kidneys, relaxing atmosphere of the Spa Park, perfect complement to walks and physical activity

alt.1: Antoni mineral water in Muszyna

cta.header: Discover the source of health in the heart of the Beskids
cta.text: You don’t have to go far to take care of your health. In Muszyna, everything is within reach – natural springs, clean air, and a spa climate. Come to Muszynova, drink water from the spring, enjoy your favorite sport, and feel the difference!

8.title: The magic of Muszyna – local legends and tales from the Poprad Valley
8.text: Muszyna is not only a spa with beautiful landscapes and mineral waters – it’s also a place full of old stories, mysteries, and legends passed down through generations. In the shadow of the mountains and the murmur of the Poprad lie tales that add extraordinary charm to this place. Join us to discover the most famous local legends that have long ignited the imagination of residents and tourists alike.
8.header2: Does the princess’s ghost still guard the castle ruins?
8.header3: TOP 3 legends from Muszyna you should know

meta.title: Local legends and stories of Muszyna | Muszynova Blog
meta.description: Discover the mysterious tales of Muszyna – from the White Lady to enchanted treasures. Experience the region’s magic through legends and local stories on the Muszynova blog.

list.1: 1. The legend of the White Lady of Muszyna Castle Long ago, a princess lived in the castle who died tragically defending her people. It is said that on moonlit nights you can still see the White Lady walking among the ruins, guarding ancient secrets and treasures hidden in the underground.
list.2: 2. The enchanted treasure under Malnik Hill Legend has it that a huge treasure – gold belonging to a bandit leader – is hidden in one of the caves under Malnik. But only someone with a pure heart and good intentions will be able to find it. Others hear only the echo of mysterious voices and never return the same way.
list.3: 3. The Lovers’ Spring in the Sensory Gardens According to local lore, long ago a pair of lovers secretly met at a spring in the valley. Though their love was forbidden, they swore fidelity by the spring water. Today, many believe that drinking from this place brings happiness in love.
list.4: Magical places with soul Muszyna is full of symbolic sites: old chapels, legendary stones, springs with “power”. While walking around, it’s worth asking the locals – they know these stories best and love to share them.
list.5: Why know local legends? Because they give a place soul. Walking through Muszyna, everything suddenly becomes deeper – every path may hide a story, every tree may have witnessed history. It’s a great way to combine relaxation with discovering the region’s culture.

alt.1: Castle in Muszyna in sunlight

cta.header: Experience Muszyna through legends and tales
cta.text: Immerse yourself in the extraordinary world of folklore, ghosts, and mysterious places. Come to Muszyna, walk among the castle ruins, visit the lovers’ spring, and feel the magic that has drawn people to this valley for centuries.
cta.button: Discover Muszyna’s legends with your own eyes

9.title: What to See in Krynica-Zdrój? 15 Best Attractions You Must Know!
9.text: Krynica-Zdrój is not only Poland's most famous spa town, it is a true gem of the Beskid Sądecki mountains that enchants visitors in every season. Mountain air, healing mineral waters, a lively promenade, ski slopes, and breathtaking views – that's why over a million tourists come here every year. We've prepared an up-to-date list of 15 must-see places for you. And if you're looking for the perfect base – at the end we suggest where to stay in the best location in Krynica!
9.header2: The Most Beautiful Places and Attractions in Krynica-Zdrój
9.header3: Why is Krynica-Zdrój still number 1 in the Polish mountains?

meta.title: 15 Best Attractions in Krynica-Zdró – What is Worth Seeing?
meta.description: Current TOP 15 attractions in Krynica-Zdrój: Jaworzyna Krynicka, Sankostrada, Main Pump Room, new VeloKrynica cycling paths and much more. The perfect plan for a weekend or longer holiday.

list.1: 1. Jaworzyna Krynicka (1114 m) + gondola lift – an absolute must-see! A modern 7.7 km gondola takes you to the summit in just 7 minutes. At the top: 360° viewing platform (you can even see the Tatra Mountains!), restaurant, walking trails, and in winter the best ski slopes in the region.
list.2: 2. Sankostrada on Góra Krzyżowa – the longest year-round sled track in Poland (3000 m of descent!). Guaranteed thrills for kids and adults – it even operates in the rain thanks to a special system.
list.3: 3. The Promenade and Main Pump Room – the heart of Krynica. Beautiful architecture, concerts, atmospheric cafés, and the chance to drink famous mineral waters straight from the source: Zuber, Słotwinka, Jan, Tadeusz.
list.4: 4. Góra Parkowa with historic funicular railway (from 1937!) – a technical monument. At the top: Paradise Slides (gravity slide), playground, rope park, and viewpoint.
list.5: 5. Paradise Slides – new – 4 sliding tracks (including one 800 m long!). Perfect family fun, open all year round.
list.6: 6. „Baśń” Toy Museum – over 5,000 exhibits from around the world. From antique dolls to 1960s Lego sets – kids go wild, adults return to their childhood.
list.7: 7. Nikifor Krynicki Museum – a must for fans of naïve art. Works by the famous Lemko primitive painter in the beautiful „Romanówka” villa.
list.8: 8. Love Benches and Pump Room with live music – in the evening the promenade becomes the most romantic place in the mountains. Concerts, twinkling lights, wine, and an atmosphere straight out of the 1930s.
list.9: 9. VeloKrynica cycling routes – 12 km of new asphalt trail from Krynica to Muszyna along the stream. Perfect for families, scooters, and rollerblades.
list.10: 10. Słotwiny Arena ski slopes – more modern and less crowded than Jaworzyna. 10 km of runs, 6-person chairlift, snowpark, and night skiing under floodlights.
list.11: 11. Health & Relaxation Centre at Hotel Czarny Potok **** – thermal pools with sulphuric water, sauna zone, salt cave, and peat treatments. The best spa in Krynica.
list.12: 12. Pumptrack and enduro trails on Góra Krzyżowa – free pumptrack for cyclists and a new network of enduro trails (from green to black).
list.13: 13. Krynica Tree Trail – new educational forest path with information boards about trees and huge insect sculptures. Great for children.
list.14: 14. Lemko Trail – a trail of Lemko culture: wooden churches in Tylicz, Powroźnik (UNESCO), and Mochnaczka – just 30 minutes by car from Krynica.
list.15: 15. Krynica Fair and events – Economic Forum, Jan Kiepura Festival, Running Festival, New Year’s Eve on the slope – check the calendar because something is always happening!

alt.1: Gondola lift to Jaworzyna Krynicka in winter

cta.header: Done with Krynica? Time for Muszynova!
cta.text: Only 10 km from Krynica – the largest recreational and sports park in the Beskid Sądecki! Squash, sports hall, bikes, gym, playroom, climbing wall, bowling, and delicious food all in one place. You only pay for the attractions you choose. The kids will go crazy with joy, and you’ll finally get to relax ;)

10.title: Follow the Trail of Icons: Discover Wooden Lemko Churches by Bike with Muszynova!
10.text: The Beskid Sądecki is not only mountains and mineral waters, but also the extraordinary cultural heritage of the Lemko people. The best way to feel the magic of this region and see its most beautiful monuments is a cycling trip! Far from the main traffic, along picturesque valleys, you’ll reach mysterious wooden Greek Catholic churches – one of which is on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Muszynova Park is your perfect base – hop on a bike and hit the trail!
10.header2: The Most Beautiful Wooden Churches Near Muszyna and Krynica
10.header3: Why Explore the Church Trail by Bike?

meta.title: By Bike Along the UNESCO Church Trail – Powroźnik, Szczawnik and the Muszyna Area
meta.description: The most interesting Lemko churches in the Poprad Valley. See how to cycle from Muszynova to Powroźnik (UNESCO) and Szczawnik. A perfect family-friendly route.

list.1: 1. Church in Powroźnik (UNESCO) – A must-see on the trip! Only 6 km from Muszyna, one of the oldest and most valuable examples of wooden sacral architecture in Poland, inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Admire the original 18th-century iconostasis.
list.2: 2. Church in Szczawnik – Picturesquely situated in a stream valley, about 10 km from Muszyna. It stands out with its simple form and harmonious integration into the mountain landscape. Perfect spot for a moment of reflection and a break on the trail.
list.3: 3. Church in Krynica-Zdrój (St. Apostles Peter and Paul) – If you extend your route to Krynica (along the VeloKrynica trail!), visit this beautiful late-19th-century temple. Slightly newer, but its interior and carved iconostasis are truly impressive.
list.4: 4. Church in Tylicz (St. Cosmas and Damian) – An option for more endurance cyclists. A bit farther away, but worth seeing for its rich interior and characteristic three-tower structure.
list.5: 5. By bike, not by car – Why? Quiet roads and paths (such as VeloKrynica) mean minimal car traffic. You can stop anywhere to enjoy the views and breathe the mountain air. It’s also family-friendly!
list.6: 6. Muszynova Park Bike Rental – Don’t have a bike? No problem! We offer mountain and trekking bikes that will effortlessly take you to every church on the Beskid hills. We also rent child seats and helmets!
list.7: 7. Recovery after the trip – When you return to Muszynova, full relaxation awaits! Recover your muscles or enjoy a well-deserved meal at the Restaurant.

alt.1: Bicycle parked next to a Lemko wooden church

cta.header: Ready for a Historical Adventure on Two Wheels?
cta.text: Plan your trip today! Booking a bike at Muszynova guarantees reliable equipment and a successful adventure. Discover the secrets of the Poprad Valley in the best possible way – active and close to nature.

park.text: For us, activity means variety. So that everyone can enjoy it, spend their time well, however they like, regardless of skill level or sports discipline. We’re ready for both fun and intense workouts – for the young and old, amateurs and professionals. Professional equipment, modern facilities in a beautiful interior – all of this awaits you at Muszynova. Come and discover!

alt.1: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park from the outside against a beautiful natural backdrop

active.text1: Looking for a place that offers entertainment, sports, and relaxation all in one? The Muszynova Sports and Recreation Park is a space designed for people of all ages – families with children, team sports enthusiasts, mountain adventure lovers, and anyone who values an active lifestyle.
active.text2: It’s the perfect place for a daily workout, a weekend getaway, or a longer stay in picturesque Muszyna – a renowned spa town in the heart of the Beskid Sądecki mountains. The park combines modern technological and sports solutions with natural surroundings – all to provide comfort and a variety of activities.
active.text3: Here you'll find a sports hall with a professional surface, climbing wall, gym, fitness room, mini bowling alley, playroom for children, squash and table tennis courts, as well as a VR and multimedia zone. For outdoor fans, we offer a bicycle rental.
active.text4: At Muszynova, we focus on activity without limits – regardless of age, skill level, or preferred type of movement. With us, you’ll combine enjoyment with taking care of your health, fitness, and well-being.

list.2: Excellent location in spa town Muszyna
list.3: Attractions for children, youth, and adults
list.4: Zones for relaxation, recreation, and intense training
list.6: Possibility to organize events, tournaments, and training sessions with a coach

cards.text: Muszyna is a well-known and beloved spa town that has been developing dynamically in recent years, attracting tourists from all over the world. This charming resort, nestled in the Beskid Sądecki region, captivates with its nature and numerous attractions, including sensory gardens, historic landmarks, mountain and cycling trails, as well as mineral water springs.

card1.text: With a certified, multi-layered Gerflor Teraflex sports surface. We invite you to play team sports: indoor football, volleyball, basketball, handball, badminton, as well as gymnastics.

card2.text: Equipped with two bowling lanes. We’ve also included a relaxation area in the bowling room for users waiting to start their game.

card3.text: Designed for both amateurs and professionals. Our structure is a modern space with geometric shapes and protrusions, covering 90 m². The wall’s size allows three people to use it simultaneously, featuring 6 top-rope belay points and 18 individual belay points.

card4.text: Equipped with a play structure where children can enjoy numerous attractions: mazes, tunnels, ladders, a slide, and ball pits. Additionally, the playroom has a dedicated toddler area with soft poufs, a ball pit, and manipulative-sensory boards, allowing the youngest to both play and learn.

card5.text: Built in accordance with WSF (World Squash Federation) guidelines. The courts are designed for both team competitions and relaxation through individual training.

card6.text: With a diverse range of bikes and accessories for children and adults who prefer spending time outdoors. You’ll find men’s, women’s, and children’s bikes, as well as essential gear for safe riding.

card7.text: Equipped with two tables for a favorite activity of both young and old – the popular game of ping pong. This attraction is suitable for people of all ages.

card8.text: Allows for a comprehensive circuit training session. You’ll find high-quality, certified, and safe equipment. The cardio zone includes treadmills, electromagnetic training bikes, rowing machines, elliptical trainers, and steppers.

card9.text: The fitness room enables comprehensive circuit and cardio training. Equipped with treadmills, electromagnetic training bikes, rowing machines, elliptical trainers, and steppers – all for your fitness and health.

card10.text: Equipped with a PlayStation console and a virtual reality (VR) system, the multimedia room is a place where gamers can immerse themselves in fascinating virtual worlds. Whether someone prefers fast-paced action games or exploratory VR adventures, our room offers complete freedom of entertainment choice.

gym.text1: If you want to effectively improve your fitness and achieve your goals with the support of qualified staff, our gym in Muszyna is the perfect place for you.
gym.text2: You’ll find high-quality equipment – certified and safe for users. Depending on your training plan and preferences, we offer a free weights zone, a machines zone, and a cardio zone.

alt.1: Sports equipment at Muszynova gym

cards.text: We provide access to modern equipment and employ experienced trainers who are ready to tailor a training plan specifically to your needs. Thanks to this personalized approach and our staff’s expertise, you’ll easily achieve your desired results. We believe that together we can create a plan that meets your expectations and motivates you to train regularly while maintaining a healthy lifestyle.

card1.text: If you’re unsure how to start, our experienced trainers will conduct a consultation with you, thoroughly analyzing your goals, training history, and any physical limitations. They’ll show you how to properly use all the available equipment.

card2.text: Our trainers can create a personalized training plan tailored to your individual needs and goals. They’ll take a comprehensive approach, considering both your current abilities and fitness aspirations, so you can achieve optimal results.

card3.text: We also offer personal training sessions, during which a trainer will personally explain how to perform each exercise correctly. With this personalized approach, your training will become even more effective, and you’ll receive detailed guidance on technique, intensity, and progression.

fitness.text1: Fitness classes at Muszynova Park were created with health, good condition, and the joy of physical activity in mind. Regardless of your skill level, age, or training goals, we have something for everyone.
fitness.text2: Our instructors are ready to guide you through various forms of activity, from high-intensity, energetic sessions to static, relaxing Pilates classes.

alt.1: Green exercise balls and mats in a mirrored fitness room in Muszyna
alt.2: Fitness class with an instructor on mats
alt.4: Fitness class with participants of all ages

cards.text: Our fitness instructors offer workouts that vary in intensity, use of additional weights, or other equipment. Depending on whether you want to improve your endurance or focus on building and strengthening muscles, you can choose the type of training yourself. Beyond burning calories and overall body strengthening, fitness is above all about having fun!

card1.text: We invite the youngest to discover the joy of movement and a healthy lifestyle together at Muszynova. Our classes for children develop physical fitness and foster positive habits that will benefit their health and condition in the future.

card2.text: For our adult participants, Muszynova offers a variety of fitness classes tailored to different skill levels, helping you maintain good physical shape while also providing a moment of relaxation and escape from daily stress.

card3.text: Our experienced personal trainers work with each client, tailoring a training plan to their individual needs, skills, and ambitions. Individual training allows you to focus on specific areas such as improving strength, weight loss, increasing flexibility, or overall fitness enhancement.

sportshall.text1: Our sports hall is a place where sport becomes a passion, and movement is a way to promote health and develop skills. It’s a space that offers excellent conditions for practicing various sports disciplines while inspiring an active lifestyle and friendly competition.
sportshall.text2: The sports hall is a facility with a court that can serve as a basketball, volleyball, badminton, or handball court. It’s a vibrant place that creates ideal conditions for both professional athletes and sports enthusiasts.

alt.1: Sports hall with volleyball net, scoreboards and climbing wall in Muszyna
alt.2: Volleyball net with climbing wall in the background

cards.text: At Muszynova, we warmly invite you to use our sports hall, where movement becomes a pleasure, and sport is not just physical activity but also a shared passion. Join us and discover the joy of staying active!

card1.text: Renting our sports hall guarantees professional infrastructure, flexible scheduling, and the support of experienced staff. We ensure that every event takes place in a friendly atmosphere, maintaining high standards of safety and comfort.

card2.text: Our hall is adapted for various sports disciplines such as basketball, volleyball, handball, and badminton. The flexibility of the space allows us to adjust the hall’s setup to specific needs, ensuring we can meet diverse expectations.

card3.text: Our sports hall was created to support physical activity and a healthy lifestyle among students. It’s possible to rent the hall for school classes or extracurricular activities.

minibowling.text1: Mini bowling is a fantastic form of entertainment that brings joy to both children and adults. Smaller pins, a shorter distance, but the same dose of fun – all of this awaits mini bowling enthusiasts at our recreational center.
minibowling.text2: Mini bowling doesn’t require special skills, making it accessible to everyone. It’s also a great option for spending time with friends or family, encouraging healthy competition and shared fun.

alt.1: Girls playing on a mini bowling alley in Muszynova

cards.text: At Muszynova, we warmly invite you to our modern bowling alley, where a great atmosphere, modern facilities, and enthusiastic staff create the perfect conditions to enjoy this classic yet thrilling game. Let every throw be a reason for smiles and good fun!

card1.text: Bowling isn’t just a game for adults – it’s also a fantastic form of entertainment for the little ones. Colorful pins catch children’s attention, creating a dynamic and joyful atmosphere. It’s great fun and a way to develop motor skills, precision, and teamwork with peers.

card2.text: Bowling is a perfect way to organize an active party that will delight both young children and older guests.

card3.text: We offer the opportunity to organize dynamic group activities. It’s a great option for companies, schools, or groups of friends looking for an engaging and team-building way to spend time together.

climbingwall.text1: The climbing wall is a perfect year-round activity. It inspires you to reach new heights and overcome your own limitations.
climbingwall.text2: Our climbing wall offers unforgettable experiences for climbers of all skill levels, from those just starting their climbing journey to seasoned enthusiasts.

alt.1: Climbing wall with colorful elements in Muszyna
alt.2: Girl climbing on the climbing wall in Muszynova

cards.text: Safety is our priority. The solid construction of the wall and professional safety measures ensure that every climber can focus on reaching new heights without worrying about their safety. Our climbing wall offers a variety of routes tailored to the skills and experience of each climber.

card1.text: We invite you to join our group climbing wall classes. Our sessions are designed for various skill levels, adapting to the abilities and experience of each participant.

card2.text: Our experienced instructors will tailor the program to your skill level, personal goals, and learning pace. This allows you to focus on the specific aspects of climbing that matter most to you. It’s also an ideal option for those who value privacy and want to concentrate on their own progress.

card3.text: For schools, we offer educational classes where students can develop climbing skills under the watchful eye of experienced instructors. It’s a great opportunity to improve physical fitness, foster teamwork skills, and build confidence.

playground.text1: The children’s playroom is a space designed especially for the little ones, allowing them to play and spend active time in a safe environment. In this room, children have access to a variety of attractions that bring them joy and fun.
playground.text2: They can enjoy creative activities and other forms of entertainment. The playroom ensures that every child feels comfortable and has the opportunity to interact with their peers. It’s a perfect place where kids can develop their social skills, share with others, and collaborate in a group.

alt.1: Toys, table, and chairs in the playroom in Muszyna
alt.3: Play mat with children's toys on it

cards.header: You Train While Your Child Plays Under Our Caregivers’ Supervision.
cards.text: Organize a birthday party at Muszynova. We provide excellent conditions and a range of attractions to make this day even more special. We offer spacious rooms perfect for hosting a birthday party, themed decorations, and entertainers. For the youngest, we provide animations, games, and contests. For older children, we have a wide range of attractions, such as mini bowling, a multimedia room, or a gaming zone.

card1.text: While you focus on an intense workout, we ensure safe and joyful playtime for your child. In a specially designed play area, under the supervision of a caregiver, your child can enjoy all the attractions and have a great time. We make sure every child feels comfortable and can actively spend time in a safe environment.

card2.text: Our entertainers will ensure the kids’ time is filled with smiles. We organize creative games, contests, and arts and crafts activities tailored to the children’s age and interests. Safety and the well-being of the children are our priority, so you can rest assured that your child is under the constant care of qualified professionals who will take care of every detail to create a day full of positive experiences and joy.

card3.text: We are a new venue in our area offering a modern jungle gym for children. It’s a specially designed space where your little ones can explore, play, and develop their skills through interaction with elements tailored to their age. Our innovative jungle gym concept guarantees that children will have a unique opportunity to gain new skills through play in a safe and friendly environment.

squash.text1: Our squash court is a place where enthusiasts of this dynamic sport will find everything they need for an exciting game.
squash.text2: Equipped with a professional court, our space is designed for both experienced players and those just starting their squash journey. Come, dive into the fast-paced game of squash, and experience unforgettable emotions!

alt.1: Professional squash court with certified dimensions
alt.2: Squash court with a racket and ball in the foreground
alt.3: Racket and ball on a squash court
alt.4: Squash court with racket and ball

cards.text: Take on the challenge and try your hand at squash – a dynamic and increasingly popular sport that originated from tennis. It’s an intense game that delivers an adrenaline rush while also improving mobility and fitness. It’s not only an effective conditioning workout but also a great opportunity to burn a lot of calories. By playing squash, you’re not just having fun – you’re actively taking care of your health and physical condition.

card1.header: The Only One in the Area
card1.text: A unique squash court offering unforgettable experiences. The only space of its kind in Muszyna and the surrounding area!

card2.text: Book your squash court with just a few clicks through our online reservation system, saving you time.

card3.text: We invite you to use our squash court 7 days a week. Call us at 509 445 000 or book online.

bikerental.text1: Our bike rental is the perfect spot for outdoor activity enthusiasts. We offer a wide selection of bikes – from city to mountain models – for both children and adults.
bikerental.text2: Rent a bike and explore the picturesque trails of Muszyna and its surroundings, enjoying the beauty of nature. It’s a great way to stay active and enjoy leisure time, regardless of your experience!

alt.1: Numerous bicycles with Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park in the background in Muszyna
alt.2: Reception area with a comfortable couch against the staircase backdrop in Muszynova

cards.text: At Muszynova, we offer modern bikes in excellent condition, tailored to various trails and needs. Rent a bike and set off on an adventure – from leisurely rides to challenging mountain trails. It’s not just a way to stay active, but also an opportunity to explore the region in an eco-friendly way!

card1.text: Discover Muszyna and its surroundings by bike – we recommend the best trails for both beginner and advanced cyclists!

card2.text: Rent the perfect bike for you – we have city bikes, mountain bikes, children’s bikes, and accessories like helmets and child seats.

card3.text: Our bike rental is open 7 days a week. Call us at 509 445 000 and start your cycling adventure!

gameroom.text1: At Muszynova Park, we wanted to create a place where you can compete and have fun with your friends. For fans of strategy and precision, we offer a professional billiards table and table tennis tables where you can improve your concentration and hand-eye coordination skills. Additionally, for those who enjoy fast-paced and thrilling games, we’ve prepared a foosball table and an air hockey table.
gameroom.text2: A friendly atmosphere, modern equipment, and excellent entertainment ensure that the time spent at Muszynova is not only active but also incredibly enjoyable. We invite you to discover the fascinating world in a new way.

alt.1: Flick football table with table football and ping pong table in the background
alt.2: Bright room with table football and flick football game
alt.4: Pool table in the game room at Muszynova

cards.text: In our game room, you’ll find attractions that provide unforgettable moments, whether you’re playing solo or with friends and family. The professional billiards table offers the chance to compete and hone your skills, creating an atmosphere of sporting passion. Meanwhile, the foosball and air hockey tables immerse players in a world of excitement and fast-paced action. At Muszynova, we focus not only on physical activity but also on the overall enjoyment of your time at our recreational center. We invite you to explore the fascinating world of games and fun at Muszynova!

card1.text: Billiards is not only great fun but also an excellent way to develop concentration, precision, and strategic planning skills. Playing billiards allows you to build strategies and tactics. Regardless of your skill level, billiards is accessible to everyone while offering excitement for both amateurs and professionals.

card2.text: Foosball perfectly combines competition and fun, making every game an unforgettable experience for all participants.

card3.text: Air hockey, also known as table hockey, is an electrifying game that brings competition to a flat table surface. Played with special pucks and paddles, it offers fast-paced, reflex-driven gameplay and thrilling matches full of excitement.

multimediaroom.text1: The heart of our multimedia room is the latest PlayStation, where we provide access to the best games and entertainment for console gaming fans.
multimediaroom.text2: From thrilling adventures to exciting sports matches, there’s something for everyone. All of this can be enjoyed on comfortable bean bags, creating the perfect setting to immerse yourself in the world of virtual entertainment.

alt.1: Boy holding a PlayStation 5 controller in his hand
alt.2: Boy sitting in front of a TV playing a sports game on a gaming console

cards.text: Equipped with a PlayStation console and a virtual reality (VR) system, the multimedia room is a place where gamers can dive into fascinating virtual worlds. Whether someone prefers fast-paced action games or exploratory VR adventures, our room offers complete freedom of entertainment choice.

card1.text: We invite you to our modern multimedia room, where the world of PlayStation becomes a true adventure! The latest games, unforgettable emotions, and unparalleled experiences in virtual entertainment await you.

card2.text: We invite you to discover a new dimension of entertainment in our unique multimedia room with virtual reality (VR). It’s a place where the boundaries of reality blend with fantasy, creating unforgettable experiences.

card3.text: Plan a special birthday in our fantastic multimedia room, where every moment becomes an unforgettable adventure! You don’t have to worry about the organization – our team will take care of every detail, so you can focus solely on enjoying the moment.

restaurantpage.header3: Organize with Us in a New Way
restaurantpage.text1: At Muszynova Restaurant, we bring Beskid flavors to life in a modern style. Our menu features carefully selected, healthy and light dishes made from local ingredients. A short yet refined selection with regional accents helps you discover the richness of Beskid cuisine.
restaurantpage.text2: We focus on simplicity, flavor, and quality – with no compromises. Looking for a light lunch, a family meal, or something delicious for the evening? Everyone will find something at our place – kids, teens, and adults. From traditional tastes to modern twists – including healthier versions of pizza. It's more than just food – it's a space for meetings, relaxation, and fun. Maybe a drink or a homemade dessert to end the day? At Muszynova, we take care of your taste and your time.

alt.1: Muszynova restaurant hall with atmospheric lighting
alt.2: Signature dish of Muszynova's head chef

card1.text: Muszynova Restaurant – discover flavors and have great fun. We ensure the perfect combination: good times, good company, in a great place. We provide a comfortable venue for organizing parties and events – family and social gatherings, anniversaries, corporate banquets, team-building events, communions, or weddings. Organize with us and discover a new quality.

card2.text: We have two comfortable rooms with a combined area of over 250 square meters. Both rooms can host two independent events simultaneously. Additionally, we have a sports hall available, where we organize sports events as well as exhibitions, shows, fairs, or concerts. It’s a place for you to discover.

card3.text: We invite business clients to organize conferences. Next to the restaurant, we have the Nova Room – modern and air-conditioned. It features a projector displaying images up to 15 square meters. The equipment includes fully professional audio-video cabling, allowing for quick and efficient setup with external devices. Comfortable and modern.

card4.header: Healthy Beskid Cuisine – Near Nowy Sącz
card4.text: Muszynova is a restaurant focused on health and lightness. Our menu features fresh, local ingredients and regional inspirations that will satisfy guests from Muszyna, Nowy Sącz, and beyond. Come visit, try our healthy dishes, and enjoy the Beskid atmosphere in a cozy interior.

card5.text: At Muszynova, we care for the whole family. Our kids' menu combines healthy ingredients with delicious flavors that children love. A comfortable and friendly interior makes families from Nowy Sącz and nearby towns feel right at home during shared meals.

card6.text: Charming interiors, loft atmosphere, ambient lighting, and comfort make Muszynova the perfect place to stay longer. Ideal for coffee meetups, romantic evenings, or simply relaxing with delicious food.

pricing.alt: Price list of Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park in Muszyna

alt.1: Muszynova facility - aerial view
alt.2: Menu card placed on a table at Muszynova restaurant

card4.text4: The kitchen accepts orders until 15 minutes before closing time

card6.hours2: For holders of active passes with club cards - through the back entrance from the parking side

form.message1: Thank You for Submitting the Form!
form.message2: We’ll Get Back to You as Soon as Possible.
form.error: Please fill in all required fields.
form.error2: Please confirm that you are not a robot before submitting.

muszyna.text: Muszyna, a recognized spa town, is renowned for its numerous mineral water springs and bottling plants. It features mineral water tasting rooms, sanatoriums, swimming pools, and picturesque parks.

academy.text: A fully professional football academy with a modern and extensive sports facility.

muks.text: Collaboration with sports, governmental, local, and union authorities to provide members with optimal conditions for practicing sports.

galicya.text: OSW 'GALICYA' is the perfect place for family vacations, short weekend stays, as well as business meetings and work trips. It is a recently modernized hotel and conference facility that meets standards and is adapted for people with reduced mobility.

alpina.text: The Alpina Sport & Spa Recreation Center is the perfect place to unwind and recharge for further study or work.

kolejarz.text: Located in one of Poland’s most beautiful regions, this center offers comfortable accommodations and a rich sports and recreational program.

hospital.text: Located in Krynica-Zdrój, the 20th Military Spa and Rehabilitation Hospital SPZOZ is 12 km from the Muszyna castle ruins and 33 km from Wierchomla Train Station.

artur.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day after day. Make today the first step toward achieving great goals.

activ.text: The Activ & Vital clinic was created for women at every stage of life, addressing issues from painful menstruation to perinatal therapy, and offering prevention and treatment for pelvic floor disorders.

relaks.text: Relax House 'On the Hill' in Muszyna is the perfect spot for a getaway in a spa-like setting, offering unique attractions for relaxation and rejuvenation.

revita.text: Nestled in the charming Muszyna valley, Revita Sanatorium blends the peace of nature with the healing power of local mineral waters.

aquapark.text: AquaPark Lipany, the newest thermal water park in Slovakia and the only one located in the mountains, lies in Lipany. Situated between Poprad and Prešov, it’s just 22 km from the Polish border and 40 km from Krynica-Zdrój.

krynica.text: Located in the Beskid Sądecki mountains in the Kryniczanka stream valley, Krynica is surrounded by Parkowa, Krzyżowa, and Jasiennik hills. Within the Poprad Landscape Park, it serves as a gateway to nearby mountains.

hotel.text: Opened in 2010 in the scenic Muszyna-Złockie valley in the heart of Beskid Sądecki, Hotel Muszyna*** is surrounded by the stunning landscapes of the Poprad Landscape Park.

reviews.text: Welcome to Muszynova – a place where elegance meets exquisite taste. Enjoy delicious dishes, from juicy burgers to exquisite tartares and sweet desserts, paired with refreshing drinks. Our polite service and calm atmosphere will make every visit a moment of relaxation and pleasure. Spend a lovely afternoon with your loved ones and discover why our guests keep coming back for more!

1.name: Mariolka Pyrz
1.text: A very elegant restaurant. Delicious tartar, very good pizzas, and excellent desserts. A very nice place to relax. Highly recommend 👍

2.name: Amelia
2.text: The service was polite and always smiling, creating a nice atmosphere. The place is calm, perfect for relaxation. The burger was delicious and juicy, and the Aperol refreshing and perfectly balanced.

3.name: Beata Sękowska
3.text: A great place to spend a lovely afternoon with friends. Very good drinks. Pleasant service.

4.name: AK K.
4.text: A beautiful and new playroom for small and medium-sized children, there’s even a nursing room and changing tables! Great value and a nice interior.

5.name: Bolek Lolek
5.text: Delicious schnitzel. Overall, a very well-maintained and clean place. Climbing wall, kids' room, game room, everything is new.

6.name: Monika Sam
6.text: A fantastic new place with friendly people, very nice service, and cleanliness throughout the building. The gym is well-equipped, and the trainers are helpful. Highly recommend. 🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩🤩

7.name: Magda Thomas
7.text: The latest local gem. Very nice, friendly atmosphere. Professional service, great instructors. Interesting offer and affordable prices. Definitely worth visiting regularly.

homepage.title: Muszynova - Recreational and Sports Park & Restaurant in Muszyna
homepage.description: Discover Muszynova – a recreational and sports park with a gym, climbing wall, squash, and more. Enjoy healthy dining at Muszynova Restaurant with Beskid flavors!

contact.title: Muszynova - Contact - Park and Restaurant in Muszyna
contact.description: Contact Muszynova! Recreational and Sports Park and Restaurant in Muszyna – Złockie 77c St., tel. +48 509 445 000, biuro@muszynova.pl.

aboutus.title: About Us - Muszynova in Muszyna
aboutus.description: Learn about Muszynova – a modern recreational and sports park and restaurant in Muszyna. We offer sports, entertainment, and Beskid flavors for everyone!

park.title: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park - Activities in Muszyna
park.description: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park in Muszyna – gym, fitness, squash, bikes, sports hall, playroom. Entertainment and sports for everyone!

gym.title: Muszynova Gym - Training and Passes in Muszyna
gym.description: Muszynova Gym in Muszyna – modern equipment, personal trainers, training plans, and passes. Improve your fitness and achieve your goals!

fitness.title: Muszynova Fitness - Classes in Muszyna
fitness.description: Fitness at Muszynova – classes for kids and adults in Muszyna. Personal and group training, pilates – improve your fitness and enjoy movement!

squash.title: Muszynova Squash - Court in Muszyna
squash.description: Squash at Muszynova – the only professional court in Muszyna. Play 7 days a week, book online, improve your fitness, and enjoy a dynamic game!

multimediaroom.title: Muszynova Multimedia Room – Modern Entertainment in Muszyna
multimediaroom.description: Discover the modern Multimedia Room at Muszynova! Interactive games, virtual reality, and unforgettable entertainment for the whole family. See what awaits you!

gameroom.title: Muszynova Game Room - Entertainment in Muszyna
gameroom.description: Muszynova Game Room in Muszyna – billiards, foosball, air hockey, table tennis for everyone. Active entertainment, competition, and fun – visit us!

climbingwall.title: Muszynova Climbing Wall
climbingwall.description: Muszynova Climbing Wall in Muszyna – safe group and individual classes, for schools. Climbing for kids and adults at all levels!

minibowling.title: Muszynova Mini Bowling - Muszyna
minibowling.description: Muszynova Mini Bowling in Muszyna – fun for kids, adults, and groups. Birthdays, team-building, bowling in a friendly atmosphere – check us out!

playroom.title: Muszynova Playroom - Muszyna
playroom.description: Muszynova Playroom in Muszyna – for kids: jungle gym, animations, birthdays, games. Safe childcare during parents’ training – joy and development!

bikerental.title: Muszynova Bike Rental
bikerental.description: Muszynova Bike Rental in Muszyna – bikes for everyone, local trails, 7 days a week. Explore the region actively – check our pricing!

sportshall.title: Muszynova Sports Hall - Muszyna
sportshall.description: Muszynova Sports Hall in Muszyna – rentals, team games: basketball, volleyball, badminton. Offer for schools and sports enthusiasts!

restaurant.title: Muszynova Restaurant - Beskid Flavors in Muszyna
restaurant.description: Muszynova Restaurant in Muszyna – regional Beskid cuisine, pizza, drinks, events, conferences. Delicious and modern – visit us!

pricing.title: Pricing for Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park
pricing.description: Discover the current pricing for services and products at Muszynova. Check the details and choose the best offer for you!

groupclasses.title: Muszynova Group Classes - Muszyna
groupclasses.description: Group classes at Muszynova – fitness, climbing, squash, and more in Muszyna. Join group training and enjoy team activities!

gallery.title: Gallery - Muszynova
gallery.description: Welcome to the Muszynova gallery! See photos of the park and restaurant, showcasing the beauty and unique atmosphere of our place.

parkgallery.title: Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park Gallery
parkgallery.description: Welcome to the Muszynova Recreational and Sports Park gallery. See areas for active leisure, sports attractions, and the beauty of nature!

restaurantgallery.title: Muszynova Restaurant Gallery
restaurantgallery.description: Discover the Muszynova Restaurant photo gallery. See elegant interiors, appetizing dishes prepared with passion, and a unique atmosphere that delights guests and makes every visit unforgettable!

partners.title: Our Partners | Muszyna, Krynica-Zdrój & More
partners.description: Discover our partners: spas, hotels, sports academies, and attractions in Muszyna, Krynica-Zdrój, and the Beskid Sądecki region.

blog.title: Blog - Muszynova
blog.description: Discover the latest articles on the Muszynova blog – inspiration, travel tips, and guides for those planning a getaway to Muszyna and its surroundings.

dofinansowanie.title: EU Funding – Muszyna Recreational and Sports Park
dofinansowanie.description: A modern recreational and sports park in Muszyna, implemented with EU funding. The investment supports the development of tourism and the spa offer in the region.

polityka-cookies.title: Our Muszynova Cookie Policy
polityka-cookies.description: Learn how we use cookies on muszynova.pl to provide you with the best experience, personalize content, and analyze site traffic. Check how you can manage cookie settings!

notfound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
notfound.text: PS: This often happens due to a typo in the URL or if the page has moved to a slightly different address...

error.title: Something Went Wrong!
error.text: We're sorry, there was an issue. Please try again later or contact us if the problem persists.

polityka-cookies.text: We use cookies on our website to provide the best user experience, support website functionality, analyze traffic, and deliver personalized advertisements. Below, we explain what cookies we use, their purpose, and how you can manage them.

essential.text: These enable the website to function, e.g., by saving your language settings (via Next-Intl) or enabling online booking features. These cookies are necessary and do not require your consent.

analytics.text: These cookies are activated only with your consent via the cookie banner.

items.ga4: Google Analytics 4 (via Google Tag Manager): We use it to analyze website traffic, e.g., the number of visits, time spent on the site, or traffic sources. Data is transferred to Google (USA) to optimize the website and improve its usability.

advertising.text: These cookies are activated only with your consent via the cookie banner.

items.googleAds: Google Ads (via Google Tag Manager): We use these to deliver personalized ads, e.g., remarketing, based on your behavior on the website. Data is transferred to Google (USA) to optimize advertising campaigns.

additional.text: We use Google Search Console, which does not use cookies but helps us monitor the website’s performance in Google search results, e.g., analyzing keywords and improving SEO.

how.text: During your first visit to our website, we display a cookie banner that allows you to:

list.acceptAll: Accept all cookies, including analytics (Google Analytics 4) and advertising (Google Ads) cookies.
list.rejectNonEssential: Reject analytics and advertising cookies, meaning we will not use Google Analytics 4 or Google Ads to track your activity.
list.customize: Customize settings by choosing which cookie categories you consent to (e.g., only advertising or only analytics).
list.manage: Your preferences are stored in the browser’s memory (`localStorage`) and applied during subsequent visits. You can change your settings at any time by clearing cookies in your browser settings.

browsers.text: You can also manage cookies in your browser settings. Here are instructions for popular browsers:

howlong.header: How long do we store cookies?
howlong.text: The storage duration of cookies depends on their type:

list.essential: Essential cookies: Typically expire after the session ends or within a short period (e.g., a few days).
list.analytics: Analytics cookies: May be stored for up to 2 years (e.g., Google Analytics 4).
list.advertising: Advertising cookies: May be stored for up to 2 years (e.g., Google Ads).

transfer.text: Data collected by Google Analytics 4 and Google Ads (via Google Tag Manager) is transferred to the USA. Data transfers comply with GDPR requirements, based on Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC) or other approved data protection mechanisms. For more information, see the privacy policies:

change.text: If you want to change your cookie preferences, clear cookies in your browser settings, which will trigger the cookie banner to reappear on your next visit.

contact.text: If you have questions about our cookie policy or data processing, please contact us:

banner.text: Hi! We use cookies (e.g., Google Analytics, Google Ads) to make your visit to triotravel.pl even better – from personalization to traffic analysis. You have full control over the settings!

settings.text: You can choose which cookies to accept. Essential cookies are always enabled to ensure the website functions properly.

essential.label: Essential Cookies (always active)
essential.description: Ensure the website works, e.g., by saving language preferences.

analytics.label: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us analyze traffic and improve UX (e.g., Google Analytics).
